name: Amusement Park Broadcast Tower
description: A wondrous device present in several places throughout the Veluriyam Mirage, it uses some special mechanism to broadcast pre-recorded messages, allowing staff to communicate with guests with ease.\nAt the same time, this device provides a number of functions critical to the designer, such as allowing attractions including "Daiya's Three-Day Reverie" to exist and function smoothly, providing fresh and exciting experiences to guests.
